entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
